To reproduce the files in this folder run the following commands:

    messes convert save-directives mwtab ms json
    messes convert save-directives mwtab nmr json
    messes convert save-directives mwtab nmr_binned json

    messes convert save-directives mwtab ms csv
    messes convert save-directives mwtab nmr csv
    messes convert save-directives mwtab nmr_binned csv

    messes convert save-directives mwtab ms xlsx
    messes convert save-directives mwtab nmr xlsx
    messes convert save-directives mwtab nmr_binned xlsx
